trans-unit.source: Enumerates the values of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""></xref> for a specific <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A értékeinek enumerálása <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""> </xref> egy adott <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The word emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: A word hangsúlyt példányok <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>keresztül a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>tulajdonság az <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objektum a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>példányon található <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> tulajdonság</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> által visszaadott</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> értéke

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render emphasis; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: Minden egyes szintetikus beszédfelismerési motor szabad határozni, hogy miként lehet megjeleníteni a hangsúlyt; hangsúlyt jellegét a nyelveket, nyelvjárást, genders vagy hangok eltérnek.

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisWord and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: Mindkét EmphasisWord és <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>is használható, ha a beállítás, illetve a a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>a egy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>példány.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisWord are greater than or equal to zero, and the values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: A két érték különböztethetők meg, hogy a tényleges EmphasisWord értékei kisebb, mint nulla, és értékeit <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>összes kevésbé; nullánál, és az értékének <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>által visszaadott a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>tulajdonságát a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>által visszaadott objektum a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>tulajdonság példányhoz.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: Indicates an engine-specific default level of emphasis.
trans-unit.target: Egy hangsúlyt motor vonatkozó alapértelmezett szintjét jelzi.
Azt jelzi, hogy nincs megadva hangsúlyt.
